type test1 = keyof { a: 'a', b: 'b' } // 'a' | 'b'
type test2 = { [P in test1]: 'a' } // { a: 'a', b: 'a' }
type test1 = 1 extends 1 ? true : false; // true

infer ç”¨äºæ¨æ–­ï¼Œæœ‰ç‚¹æ¨¡å¼åŒ¹é…çš„æ„æ€ï¼Œå¸¸ç»“åˆä¸‰å…ƒè¡¨è¾¾å¼è¿”å›æ¨æ–­å¾—åˆ°çš„å€¼ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚åœ¨å†…ç½®ç±»å‹ ReturnType ä¸­ï¼Œinfer ç”¨äºåŒ¹é…å‡½æ•°çš„è¿”å›å€¼ Pã€‚è·å–è¿”å›å€¼åå†é€šè¿‡ä¸‰å…ƒè¡¨è¾¾å¼æŠŠ P å›ä¼ å‡ºå»ã€‚

type GetReturnType<T extends (...args: any) => any> = T extends (...args: any) => infer P ? P : never
type test1 = GetReturnType<() => string | number> // string | number

type test_bool = true
type test_num = 1
type test_string = `a_${test_num}`
type test_tupple = ['a', 'b']
type test_object = { a: 'a' }
TypeScript conditional types - filter out readonly properties / pick only required properties

type test1<T> = T | string
type test2 = test1<number>

é€‰æ‹©å¯¹åº” TS ä¸­çš„ extendsã€‚ç”¨æ¥åˆ¤æ–­æŸç§èŒƒå›´æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯å¦ä¸€ç§èŒƒå›´çš„å­é›†ï¼ˆæ›´ä¸¥è°¨çš„è¯´æ³•æ˜¯åˆ¤æ–­æŸç§ç±»å‹æ˜¯å¦å¯ä»¥åˆ†é…ç»™å¦ä¸€ç§ç±»å‹ï¼‰ã€‚è¿™é‡Œçš„èŒƒå›´å¯ä»¥æ˜¯æŸç§å€¼ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ˜¯æŸç§ç±»å‹ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ° 1 extends number æˆ– number extends number | string è¿™ç§å†™æ³•ã€‚æ—¢ç„¶æ˜¯åˆ¤æ–­èŒƒå›´è€Œä¸æ˜¯ç›´æ¥åˆ¤æ–­å€¼æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ‰ä¼šé€šè¿‡ç»“åˆä¸‰å…ƒè¿ç®—è¿”å› true æˆ– false æ¥è¾¾åˆ°è¿”å›æŸç§å€¼çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚
type test = 1 extends 1 ? (/* other logic */) : (/* other logic */)
type For<n extends number, res extends string = ''> = n extends 0 ? res : For<n-1, res + 'x'>

type test2 = [] extends {} ? true : false; // true
type test3 = {} extends [] ? true : false; // false
type test4 = 'a' extends string ? true : false; // true
type test5 = never extends any ? true : false; // true

ä»¥ä¸‹ç”¨ Equals å®ç°äº†ä¸€ä¸ªæ›´æ¥è¿‘ç­‰å·è¯­ä¹‰çš„å‡½æ•°ã€‚å¦‚æœä»…åŒ…å«ç±»å‹ T çš„å…ƒç»„å¯ä»¥åˆ†é…ç»™ä»…åŒ…å«ç±»å‹ S çš„å…ƒç»„ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªå…ƒç»„å³ä½¿ä½ç½®äº’æ¢ï¼Œåˆ†é…è¿ç®—ä¹Ÿèƒ½æˆç«‹ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè¯´æ˜è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªç±»å‹ç›¸ç­‰ã€‚å¯¹ä»˜å¸¸è§çš„ç±»å‹ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªå‡½æ•°å°±è¶³å¤Ÿäº†ã€‚ç»™ Euqals ä¼ å…¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å­—é¢é‡ã€æ•°å­—æˆ–æ˜¯ç±»å‹ï¼Œä»–éƒ½èƒ½æœ‰æ•ˆè¿”å›ã€‚

type Equals<T, S> =
    [T] extends [S]
    ? ([S] extends [T] ? true : false)
    : false
å’Œ JS ä¸ä¸€æ ·çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œé™¤äº†æ¯”è¾ƒè¿ç®—çš„å…¶å®ƒè¿ç®—ï¼ˆåŠ å‡ä¹˜é™¤ç­‰ï¼‰åœ¨ TS ç±»å‹ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­æ˜¯ä»¶éš¾äº‹å„¿ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå…¥å‚ä¸åŒï¼Œå®ç°ä¹Ÿä¸åŒã€‚éœ€è¦åˆ†æƒ…å†µè®¨è®ºã€‚

å…ƒç»„æ˜¯ TS ç±»å‹ç³»ç»Ÿçš„åŸºç¡€ï¼Œå…¶åŸºæœ¬è¿ç®—å¯ä»¥æ¦‚æ‹¬ä¸º Pushã€Popã€UnShiftã€Shiftã€‚åˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯åœ¨å°¾éƒ¨æ–°å¢ä¸€é¡¹ã€å»é™¤å°¾éƒ¨ä¸€é¡¹ã€åœ¨å¤´éƒ¨æ–°å¢æ„å‘ã€å»é™¤å¤´éƒ¨ä¸€é¡¹ã€‚åŠ æ³•å’Œå‡æ³•åˆ†åˆ«å¯¹åº” Pushã€UnShift å’Œ Popã€Shiftã€‚è§ä¸‹ä»£ç ï¼Œåœ¨è¿™ç§å…ƒç»„åŠ æ³•çš„å®ç°ä¸­ï¼Œçµæ´»ä½¿ç”¨å±•å¼€è¿ç®—ç¬¦ï¼Œæ„é€ å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªæ–°æ•°ç»„ã€‚å‡æ³•çš„å®ç°åˆ™ä¾èµ–ä½¿ç”¨ infer è‡ªåŠ¨æ¨æ–­ã€‚

type raw = ['a', 'b', 'c']

type Push<T extends any[], Item> = [...T, Item]
type test_Push = Push<raw, 'd'> // ['a','b','c','d']

type UnShift<T extends any[], Item> = [Item, ...T]
type test_UnShift = UnShift<raw, '0'> // ['0','a','b','c']

type Pop<T extends any[]> = T extends [...infer Pre, infer Last] ? [...Pre] : never
type test_Pop = Pop<raw> // ['a','b']

type Shift<T extends any[]> = T extends [infer First, ...infer Rest] ? [...Rest] : never
type test_Shift = Shift<raw> // ['b','c']

type CreateTupple<n extends number, T extends any[] = []> =
  T['length'] extends n ? T : CreateTupple<n, [...T, any]>

type Add1<n extends number> = [...CreateTupple<n>, any]['length']
type Minus1<n extends number> =
  CreateTupple<n> extends [...infer Pre, infer Last] ? Pre['length'] : never;

type test1 = Add1<5> // 6
type test2 = Minus1<5> // 4

ï¼Œå‡æ³•åˆ™å¯¹åº” JavaScript ä¸­çš„ Replace å‡½æ•°çš„è¯­ä¹‰ã€‚è§ä¸‹ä»£ç ï¼Œåœ¨ Replace çš„å®ç°ä¸­ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æ¨¡å¼åŒ¹é…æ¨æ–­å‡º Old ä¹‹å‰çš„å­—ç¬¦å­ä¸² Front ä¸ä¹‹åçš„å­—ç¬¦å­ä¸² Endã€‚æ¨æ–­æˆåŠŸï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¿”å›åŸå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚

type raw = 'Lionad is lion'

type Replace<Str extends string, Old extends string, New extends string> =
  Str extends `${infer Front}${Old}${infer End}`
    ? `${Front}${New}${End}`
    : Str

// Lionad is not lion
type test1 = Replace<raw, 'is', 'is not'>

type raw = 'Lionad '

type Multiple<str extends string, n extends number, res extends string = ''> =
  n extends 0
    ? res
    : Multiple<str, Minus1<n>, `${res}${str}`>

type test1 = Multiple<raw, 3> // Lionad Lionad Lionad

type raw = 'x'

type Power<str extends string, n extends number> =
  n extends 0
    ? str
    : Power<`${str}${str}`, Minus1<n>>

type test1 = Power<raw, 3> // xxxxxxxxï¼ˆ2 ** 3 === 8ï¼‰

å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸æ•°å­—çš„é™¤æ³•è¦ç¨å¾®å¤æ‚ä¸€äº›ï¼Œéœ€è¦å¯¹ç»“æœåšä¸€äº›åŸºæœ¬çš„æ£€éªŒã€‚åšä¸€äº›åŸºæœ¬çš„æ£€éªŒã€‚xxxx é™¤ x å¾— 4 å¾ˆå¥½ç†è§£ï¼Œå¦‚æœ xxxxy é™¤ x é‚£ä¹ˆå°±æ˜¯éæ ‡æ“ä½œäº†ï¼Œéœ€è¦è¿”å› neverã€‚

type Divide<
  raw extends string,
  dividend extends string,
  calc extends string = raw,
  res extends number = 0
> =
  calc extends `${dividend}${infer tails}`
    ? (Divide<raw, dividend, tails, Add1<res>>)
    : (tails extends '' 
      ? (calc extends '' ? res : never)
      : never)

type test1 = Divide<'xxxx', 'x'> // 4
type test2 = Divide<'xxxxy', 'x'> // never

type CreateStr<n extends number, res extends string = ''> =
  n extends 0 ? res : CreateStr<Minus1<n>, `${res}x`>

type DivedeNum<
  n extends number,
  dividend extends number
> =
  dividend extends 0
    ? never
    : Divide<CreateStr<n>, CreateStr<dividend>>

type res = DivedeNum<88, 8> // 11

type GetStrLen<xs extends string, tmp extends string = '', res extends number = 0> =
  xs extends tmp ? res : GetStrLen<xs, `${tmp}x`, Add1<res>>

type Multiple<str extends string, n extends number, res extends string = ''> =
  n extends 0
    ? res
    : Multiple<str, Minus1<n>, `${res}${str}`>

type MultipleNum<n1 extends number, n2 extends number > = Divide<Multiple<CreateStr<n1>, n2>, 'x'>

type res = MultipleNum<6, 8> // 48

html .light .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-light);background: var(--shiki-light-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-light-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-light-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-light-text-decoration);}html.light .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-light);background: var(--shiki-light-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-light-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-light-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-light-text-decoration);}html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html .sepia .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-sepia);background: var(--shiki-sepia-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-sepia-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-sepia-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-sepia-text-decoration);}html.sepia .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-sepia);background: var(--shiki-sepia-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-sepia-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-sepia-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-sepia-text-decoration);}
